rev.comment: Rm graphic; not used in this olympics and fails [[WP:NFCC]] #10c regardless
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
<div class="tright">[[Image:Sailing 2008.png|100px|border|Sailing]]</div>
 
Sailing at the [[2012 Summer Olympics]] in [[London]] will be held from July 28 to August 11 in [[Weymouth, Dorset|Weymouth]] and [[Isle of Portland|Portland]]. Ten gold medals will be awarded and 380 athletes expected to take part <ref name="London 2012">{{cite web | year = 2009 | url = http://www.london2012.com/sports/olympic/sailing.php| title = Sailing | accessdate = 2009-04-07}}</ref>. The sailing classes have two changes from the [[Sailing at the 2008 Summer Olympics|Beijing 2008]] sailing events. The [[Match race|women's Match Race]] competition replaces the [[Yngling (keelboat)|Yngling]] competition and the [[Tornado (sailboat)|Tornado Class Catamaran]] competition has been dropped.
Sailing at the [[2012 Summer Olympics]] in [[London]] will be held from July 28 to August 11 in [[Weymouth, Dorset|Weymouth]] and [[Isle of Portland|Portland]]. Ten gold medals will be awarded and 380 athletes expected to take part <ref name="London 2012">{{cite web | year = 2009 | url = http://www.london2012.com/sports/olympic/sailing.php| title = Sailing | accessdate = 2009-04-07}}</ref>. The sailing classes have two changes from the [[Sailing at the 2008 Summer Olympics|Beijing 2008]] sailing events. The [[Match race|women's Match Race]] competition replaces the [[Yngling (keelboat)|Yngling]] competition and the [[Tornado (sailboat)|Tornado Class Catamaran]] competition has been dropped.
